quizDescription: Test your knowledge about Selena Gomez and her career!
quizTags: Selena Gomez, Music, Pop Culture, Celebrities

questions.question: When was Selena Gomez born?
questions.explanation: Selena Gomez was born on July 22, 1992, in Grand Prairie, Texas, USA.

questions.question: Which Disney Channel series made Selena Gomez a household name?
options: The Suite Life of Zack & Cody
questions.explanation: Selena Gomez gained widespread fame and recognition for her role as Alex Russo in the Disney Channel series 'Wizards of Waverly Place.'

questions.question: What is the name of Selena Gomez's debut studio album?
questions.explanation: Selena Gomez's debut studio album is titled 'Kiss & Tell,' and it was released in 2009.

questions.question: Which of the following songs is not by Selena Gomez?
options: Love You Like a Love Song
questions.explanation: 'We Don't Talk Anymore' is a song by Charlie Puth featuring Selena Gomez, not a solo song by Selena Gomez.

questions.question: In which animated movie did Selena Gomez voice the character of Mavis?
questions.explanation: Selena Gomez voiced the character of Mavis in the animated movie 'Hotel Transylvania' and its sequels.

questions.question: Which song by Selena Gomez is a collaboration with DJ Marshmello?
questions.explanation: 'Wolves' is a song by Selena Gomez and DJ Marshmello, released in 2017.

questions.question: What is the title of Selena Gomez's third studio album?
questions.explanation: Selena Gomez's third studio album is titled 'Revival,' and it was released in 2015.

questions.question: Which of these Netflix series features Selena Gomez as an executive producer?
questions.explanation: Selena Gomez served as an executive producer for the Netflix series '13 Reasons Why,' based on the novel by Jay Asher.

questions.question: Which song by Selena Gomez has the lyrics 'You promised the world and I fell for it'?
questions.explanation: The song 'Bad Liar' by Selena Gomez includes the lyrics 'You promised the world and I fell for it,' which became popular among fans.

questions.question: In which music video did Selena Gomez pay homage to her Mexican heritage?
questions.explanation: In the music video for 'Baila Conmigo,' Selena Gomez pays homage to her Mexican heritage and includes Spanish lyrics in the song.

questions.question: What is the title of Selena Gomez's second solo studio album?
questions.explanation: Selena Gomez's second solo studio album is titled 'A Year Without Rain,' and it was released in 2010.

questions.question: For which movie did Selena Gomez perform the song 'Cruella de Vil'?
questions.explanation: Selena Gomez performed the song 'Cruella de Vil' for the Disney Channel Original Movie '101 Dalmatians: The Series.'

questions.question: What is the name of Selena Gomez's debut studio album with her band 'Selena Gomez & the Scene'?
questions.explanation: Selena Gomez's debut studio album with her band 'Selena Gomez & the Scene' is titled 'Kiss & Tell,' and it was released in 2009.

questions.question: In which Disney Channel Original Movie did Selena Gomez star as the character 'Carter Mason'?
questions.explanation: Selena Gomez starred as the character 'Carter Mason' in the Disney Channel Original Movie 'Princess Protection Program.'

questions.question: Which of these famous singers is Selena Gomez's best friend?
questions.explanation: Selena Gomez and Taylor Swift share a close friendship, and Taylor Swift is often considered one of Selena's best friends in the music industry.
